rows.label: tev000111_MSG0010
rows.name:
Ever since the incident at the
Lifehold Core, there have been too
many unexplained goings-on.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000111_MSG0020
rows.name:
Under the circumstances, it may be
wise for me to check on the situation
in person... What do you think?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000111_MSG0050
rows.name:
Hah. I'm glad you're so willing to
humor me. I look forward to seeing
history being written firsthand.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000111_MSG0080
rows.name:
In that case, I'll leave the
on-the-ground survey to you.
Best of luck.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000111_MSG0090
rows.name: Oh, you're still well, I see.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000111_MSG0100
rows.name:
I'm perfectly fine, but this situation is
far from ideal.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000111_MSG0110
rows.name:
It would be wise to regroup with all our
allies and reassemble our forces as soon
as possible.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000111_MSG0120
rows.name:
As you've heard, Vandham is the
commander-in-chief of this operation.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000111_MSG0130
rows.name:
I will be joining the mission myself.
Every capable pair of hands will be
useful, under the circumstances.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000111_MSG0140
rows.name:
I, Kentaro Nagi, am now but another BLADE.
...If you wish, you can call me Ken.[ST:wait ]
